greeting.title: Hi! My name is J칩nas Helgi
greeting.text: I am a frontend developer who loves creating beautiful and user-friendly websites. I put great emphasis on ensuring that all my interfaces and websites look good on any device they are viewed on. I have a strong passion for learning new things and love tackling challenging projects. When I'm not programming, you can find me in the kitchen cooking delicious meals or playing board games with friends.

curriculum.title: The Icelandic national curriculum
curriculum.text: Design and develop the The Icelandic national curriculum to an electronic format along with ongoing development and maintenance.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.text: A page that contains an overview of all my projects, this is the page you are currently on.
